title: T206 Al Burch, Batting, SGC 50 Brown Hindu
author: bbsports

posts.post_title: T206 Al Burch, Batting, SGC 50 Brown Hindu
posts.post_content: Just picked up this tough variation in a brown Hindu back at the East Coast National. According to the SGC pop reports, this is one of only 2 graded in this condition. Taking all serious offers in cash or trade.
